oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Souvenir booklet cover from the Woman's Building

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Pamphlets; Women; Souvenirs
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cover of a 20-page booklet distributed to visitors of the Woman's Building at the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. The booklet contains information regarding the Woman's Board and Woman's Building as well as pictures. Cover includes an illustration of the Women's Department medal.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition Collection, 1895-1900
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. Van Leer Kirkman served as President of the Woman's Board. The Board consisted of one hundred women who were assisted by three hundred and twenty women commissioners.
